name: Square Shooter (AntonioDiMaggio)
description:
Square Shooter is a top down wave survival game. Utilize an endless arsenal of guns that get more epic with each passing wave! Survive in an endless variety of mazes! See how many waves you can survive as enemies get tougher every wave. Find the rare rainbow guns! Enjoy 5 original tracks!

Play on Kongregate here.

Play on Newgrounds here.

Download the soundtrack for free here.
